Package model

Class MinesweeperBoard

java.lang.Object
model.MinesweeperBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class MinesweeperBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This class defines the Board for the Minesweeper package.
Author:
kylesmith, brendanp, matthewgleason, austinhillis6, cdpeterson

      Parameters:
      currentMineBoard - the current mine board to save locally
      currentStatusBoard - the current status board to save locally
      seconds - the current elapsed seconds to save locally

  • Method Details

    • saveboard

      public void saveboard()
      This public method saves the board object into save_game.dat With use of serialization and file/ObjectOutputStream, this object is able to be encoded into the dat file and saved inside our project.

    • saveHighScores

      public void saveHighScores​(int time)
      This public method saves the given time to the high scores save file. With use of serialization and file/ObjectOutputStream, this object is able to be encoded into the dat file and saved inside our project.
      Parameters:
      time - the new time to add to the high scores

    • getHighScores

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getHighScores​(java.io.File scoresFile)
      This public method deserializes the given scoresFile into an array of integers.
      Parameters:
      scoresFile - the File object to deserialize
      Returns:
      an array of high scores from the given file
